step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your fingers closed and muscles tight as you bring your arms in. Ensure a comfortable seated or standing position.
Excellent! Open your fingers wide and extend your arms straight out to shoulder height. Remember to exhale as you relax your muscles.
Great job! Continue to open your fingers and extend your arms. Focus on relaxing your muscles as you exhale.
Nice work! Keep those arms extended and relaxed. Ensure you are breathing out fully.
You're doing well! Return to the starting position, closing your fists and tightening your muscles as you inhale.
Second rep starting strong! Remember to close your fingers and tighten your muscles while inhaling.
Good continuation! Open your fingers and extend your arms to shoulder height, exhaling as you relax.
Keep up the good form! Continue opening fingers and extending arms, exhaling and relaxing.
Excellent! Maintain the outward arm extension and relaxed posture while exhaling.
Fantastic finish to the second rep! You successfully completed the exercise by returning to the starting position with fists closed and muscles tight.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fingers open and arms extended to shoulder height while exhaling and relaxing. Then, close your fists and tighten muscles while inhaling to return to the start.
